Keywords: avatar, profile, headshot, professional, LinkedIn, social media, portrait
Prompt Template: A professional {style} portrait of [subject], {background}, {lighting}. High-quality, sharp focus on eyes.
Key Elements: Subject appearance, background, lighting style, expression
Tips: Use reference image for identity lock; specify skin texture preference
Example: Professional LinkedIn headshot with soft daylight, blurred office background

Keywords: social, Instagram, Twitter, viral, engagement, post, story, reel
Prompt Template: A {style} image for social media showing [concept]. {composition}. Vibrant colors, eye-catching, shareable.
Key Elements: Main subject, brand colors, call-to-action elements, mobile-first composition
Tips: Design for mobile viewing; use bold colors; include negative space for text overlay
Example: Minimalist product flat-lay for Instagram with pastel background

Keywords: thumbnail, YouTube, clickbait, attention, video, preview, engaging
Prompt Template: A {style} YouTube thumbnail showing [scene]. Bold text '{text}' in {font}. High contrast, {emotion} expression.
Key Elements: Subject with expressive face, bold readable text, contrasting colors, clear focal point
Tips: Use surprised/excited expressions; limit text to 3-5 words; ensure 1080p quality
Example: Shocked reaction face with glowing background and 'YOU WON'T BELIEVE THIS' text

Keywords: product, commercial, advertising, e-commerce, hero, marketing, lifestyle
Prompt Template: A {style} product shot of [product] on {surface}. {lighting} creating {mood}. {camera_angle} view.
Key Elements: Product as hero, clean background, professional lighting, brand consistency
Tips: Use studio lighting terms; specify material reflections; include lifestyle context
Example: Premium cosmetic bottle on marble surface with soft rim lighting

Keywords: e-commerce, Amazon, Shopify, product, main image, white background, listing
Prompt Template: A clean {style} product image of [product] on pure white background. Studio lighting, multiple angles available.
Key Elements: Product isolation, pure white (#FFFFFF) background, consistent lighting, accurate colors
Tips: Match platform requirements; ensure color accuracy; remove all shadows or use soft drop shadow
Example: Wireless earbuds case on pure white background with soft shadows

Keywords: infographic, educational, diagram, chart, visual, data, explainer
Prompt Template: A {style} infographic about [topic]. Bento grid layout, {color_scheme} palette, icons for each section.
Key Elements: Clear hierarchy, data visualization, iconography, readable text, logical flow
Tips: Use Bento grid for modules; limit to 8 sections max; ensure text legibility
Example: Glass-style infographic about nutrition with 8 data modules

Keywords: comic, manga, storyboard, panel, sequence, narrative, story
Prompt Template: A {panels}-panel {style} comic showing [story]. Consistent character design, speech bubbles, {mood} atmosphere.
Key Elements: Panel layout, character consistency, speech bubbles, visual flow, action lines
Tips: Maintain character identity across panels; use manga techniques for action; clear panel boundaries
Example: 4-panel manga sequence showing character discovering a secret message

Keywords: game, asset, sprite, character, icon, item, UI, gaming
Prompt Template: A {style} game asset: [item/character]. Transparent background ready, {view} view, consistent with {art_style} aesthetic.
Key Elements: Isolation-ready design, consistent art style, multiple states/angles, scalable
Tips: Design for transparency; create sprite sheets; maintain style consistency across assets
Example: Pixel art treasure chest with open/closed states

Keywords: poster, flyer, print, event, promotional, announcement, advertising
Prompt Template: A {style} poster for [event/product]. Headline: '{headline}', {layout} composition, {color_scheme} colors.
Key Elements: Typography hierarchy, visual hook, brand elements, print-ready composition
Tips: Use CMYK-safe colors; ensure 300dpi concept; include bleed area concept
Example: Vintage music festival poster with psychedelic typography and sunset gradient

Keywords: app, web, UI, UX, mockup, interface, screen, dashboard
Prompt Template: A {style} {device} mockup showing [app/website]. {color_scheme} palette, {layout} layout, modern UI elements.
Key Elements: Device frame, UI components, realistic content, responsive hints
Tips: Show realistic content; use design system patterns; include status bar details
Example: iPhone mockup showing a meditation app with glassmorphism cards

Keywords: quote, inspiration, motivational, card, typography, wisdom
Prompt Template: A {style} quote card with text: '{quote}' â€” {author}. {background} background, {font_style} typography.
Key Elements: Quote text, author attribution, decorative elements, readable font
Tips: Use large quotation marks; ensure text contrast; add subtle decorative elements
Example: Brown gradient quote card with Steve Jobs quote and portrait silhouette

Keywords: header, banner, hero, website, blog, article, cover
Prompt Template: A {style} header image for [topic]. {composition}, {mood} atmosphere, horizontal format ready for text overlay.
Key Elements: Wide aspect ratio, focal point consideration, text-safe zones, brand alignment
Tips: Leave negative space for text; ensure horizontal composition; consider responsive cropping
Example: Hand-drawn style header for tech blog with blue-green gradient

Keywords: character, OC, original, design, concept, persona, avatar
Prompt Template: A {style} character design of [description]. {pose} pose, {outfit} outfit, {personality} expression.
Key Elements: Full body or bust, consistent proportions, outfit details, personality expression
Tips: Include turnaround views; specify body proportions; describe personality through visual cues
Example: Anime-style female character with cyberpunk outfit and neon accessories

Keywords: architecture, interior, room, space, design, rendering, visualization
Prompt Template: A {style} {view} of [space type]. {materials} materials, {lighting} lighting, {atmosphere} atmosphere.
Key Elements: Spatial composition, material textures, lighting quality, furnishing details
Tips: Use architectural photography terms; specify time of day; describe material finishes
Example: Modern minimalist living room with floor-to-ceiling windows and warm afternoon light

Keywords: food, culinary, recipe, dish, restaurant, cooking, delicious
Prompt Template: A {style} food photo of [dish]. {plating} presentation, {lighting} lighting, {props} styling.
Key Elements: Hero dish focus, complementary props, appetizing lighting, styled setting
Tips: Use overhead or 45-degree angles; include human elements for scale; describe steam/freshness
Example: Overhead shot of artisan pizza with stretchy cheese pull and rustic wooden board
